Sentencas: Accurate prediction of performance degradation in complex systems such as solid oxide fuel cells is crucial for expediting technological advancements.
Titulo: Prediction of fuel cell performance degradation using a combined approach of machine learning and impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: However, significant challenges still persist due to limited comprehension of degradation mechanisms and difficulties in acquiring in-situ features.
Titulo: Prediction of fuel cell performance degradation using a combined approach of machine learning and impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: In this study, we propose an effective approach that integrates long short-term memory (LSTM) neural network and dynamic electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (DEIS).
Titulo: Prediction of fuel cell performance degradation using a combined approach of machine learning and impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: This integrated approach enables precise prediction of future evolutions in both current-voltage and EIS features using historical testing data, without prior knowledge of degradation mechanisms.
Titulo: Prediction of fuel cell performance degradation using a combined approach of machine learning and impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: For short-term predictions spanning hundreds of hours, our approach achieves a prediction accuracy exceeding 0.99, showcasing promising prospects for diagnostic applications.
Titulo: Prediction of fuel cell performance degradation using a combined approach of machine learning and impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: Additionally, for long-term predictions spanning thousands of hours, we quantitatively determine the significance of each degradation mechanism, which is crucial for enhancing cell durability.
Titulo: Prediction of fuel cell performance degradation using a combined approach of machine learning and impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: Moreover, our proposed approach demonstrates satisfactory predictive ability in both time and frequency domains, offering the potential to reduce EIS testing time by more than half.(c) 2023 Science Press and Dalian Institute of Chemical Physics, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
Titulo: Prediction of fuel cell performance degradation using a combined approach of machine learning and impedance spectroscopy
